news_header: Several companies are set to report earnings on January 30, 2025, with forecasts indicating varying growth rates.
news_original_title: Pre-Market Earnings Report for January 30, 2025 :  MA, TMO, CAT, CMCSA, BX, SNY, MMC, UPS, SHW, MO, PH, CI
news_text: On January 30, 2025, several companies will report their earnings. Mastercard (MA) expects $3.68 EPS, a 15.72% increase; Thermo Fisher (TMO) anticipates $5.93 EPS, a 4.59% increase; Caterpillar (CAT) forecasts $4.97 EPS, a 4.97% decrease; Comcast (CMCSA) expects $0.88 EPS, a 4.76% increase; Blackstone (BX) anticipates $1.46 EPS, a 31.53% increase; Sanofi (SNY) forecasts $0.70 EPS, a 21.35% decrease; Marsh & McLennan (MMC) expects $1.75 EPS, a 4.17% increase; UPS anticipates $2.52 EPS, a 2.02% increase; Sherwin-Williams (SHW) forecasts $2.07 EPS, a 14.36% increase; Altria (MO) expects $1.27 EPS, a 7.63% increase; Parker-Hannifin (PH) anticipates $6.22 EPS, a 1.14% increase; and Cigna (CI) expects $7.83 EPS, a 15.32% increase.
